title: (x) mapping/cartography fonts - ITC Franklin Gothic, ITC Berkeley Oldstyle {Yves}
content:
Could someone tell me what these two fonts are? I'm making a small map and want fonts that look good even at 3 or 4 pts. Any other recommendations?   
   
   
 ![Map fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130434im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49970.gif)
author: kbmin
